name: Teikei
description: An interactive map for community supported agriculture.

scripts.kill: killall node & killall ruby ; echo 'killed all running processes'
scripts.start:dev: npm run -s kill && npm run -s banner && nf start -j Procfile-dev
scripts.start:prod: npm run -s kill && npm run -s banner && nf start -j Procfile -p 3000
scripts.copy:assets: cp dist/*.js public/ && cp dist/*.css public/
scripts.build: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build:client && npm run -s copy:assets && npm run -s build:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && bundle exec rake assets:clobber && rm -f public/vendor.js public/app.js

author: Simon Jockers, Daniel Mack, Tobias Preu√ü, Christian Rijke
